column4: anyone know if there is a like defrag or Chach cleaner for ubuntu my computer is running real slow not like before when i first installed Ubuntu.  even in this Chat it is running slower.
run 'top' in a terminal.  what's at the top of the process list?
i ran the top there I am not sure what am looking at there is a lot going on in it..
see the 'CPU' column?  any big numbers is it?
